techmeme.title: Interview with curl project founder Daniel Stenberg, who likens "AI slop" in HackerOne submissions to a DDoS attack, echoing concerns of others like Seth Larson (Kevin Purdy/Ars Technica)
In an email to Instacart employees, Fidji Simo says the new CEO will be an existing member of the management team and she will stay on as Chair of the Board (Fidji Simo/Instacart Corporate Blog)
OpenAI hires Instacart CEO Fidji Simo as CEO of Applications, reporting to Sam Altman, who says he'll stay CEO focusing "on research, compute, and safety" (OpenAI)

so excited that @fidjissimo is joining openai in a new role: ceo of applications, reporting to me. i'll remain ceo of openai, but in this new configuration i'll be able to increase my focus on research, compute, and safety. these are critical as we approach superintelligence. (Sam Altman/@sama)
In prepared Senate testimony, Microsoft and others urge US lawmakers to streamline federal AI energy permits and open government data sets for AI training (David Shepardson/Reuters)
